history.text: I didn't realize that Disney had made 53 animated feature films by 2013. Frozen is a testament to their ability  to make movies.

Yes, I agree. I also didn't realize that it was based on fairy tale "The Snow Queen" by Hans Christian Andersent. I thought that Disney wrote the script from scratch. But they did a good job turning it into a nice 
princess tale.
What was your favorite character in the movie?
I am going to have to say Elsa. How about you?
Ah, that is a good one. I loved a iceman Olaf.
the best animated musical since the little mermaid and beauty and the beast. These movies came out when I was a child...it took some 30 year to get another good one.
good talent is hard to find.
Yes, I agree. Broadway style songs in the movie are just fantastic and memorable.
I would think that the Disney worked so long so to get it so right; the songs, the scripts.

I can't agree with you more. The great script and songs a
ttracted not only kids, but also adults. It was such a fan family movie.
The movie started with the sad story. Their parents had sad sudden death
Now i have to do some reserach on Howard Ashman. It is amazing that one person had such a penetrating effect.
Huh. I don't know who that it. Is he one of the producer of this movie?
howard Ashman was the lyricist for the little mermaid and Beauty an the Beast
Disney movies seem to start with a tragic loss.
Did he write some songs in Frozen too?
I don't think so.
the doc said frrozen was the best animated musical since his death
What is Metacritics? 74/100; that is a low score for such a influential
... for such an influential movie
Okay, thank you for letting me know. I love songs in Little Mermaid and Beauty and Beast. It is good to know who wrote those lyrics.
I am not sure. Meta means multiple, isn't it? It is critics from multiple movie professionals?
the story about sibling rivalry would also resonate with alot of people
that makes sense. about the meta-multiple thing
Yes, I agree. The story line of this movie is focusing how siblings had conflicts and developed their trust and love. Many people have similar stories with their siblings
It is interesting to see that "true love" of this movie is love between siblings.
Plot twist with key scene no 3. expect the unexpected.
I like that the movie took the focus off romantic love fo the most part. let's hear it for family love! that will get us through the rough spots in llife
Yes, romantic partners are not always someones who take you up. Family bond is sometimes just what we need.
definitely an engaging enough platform to send that type of message, indeed.
Also, it is a good way for kids to learn that they don't want to decide to get married based on love at the first sight like Anna and Hans.
thank you. people do put more effort into buying a car than a marriage mate! so this is a good message

correction**
 picking a marriage mate
Huh? It still doesn't make much sense. But it is a good message!
lol. i guess it doesn't.people can't wait another great Disney movie that has the same power as Frozen.
Yes, including me!
This movie is classified with Comedy, Adventure, Animation. What did you think about Comedy part of this movie?
wow, it has been awhile. but i do have to say that disney has been able to do cloaked jokes that adults will laughed at while the kids may or may not get right off the bat.

they are trying to appeal to adults without losing the kid-
audience

Oh, that is good to hear, but I cannot remember their cloaked jokes. Do you have any examples? All jokes or laugh parts of this movie that I can think of are Olaf does cute/funny actions and singing/dancing.
right of the bat, I can't say.  But I do love goofy jokes and antic myself. so Olaf would be guy.
Oh yeah, I completely forgot, but this movie is also about romantic love between Kristoff and Anna!
well, we couldn't avoid that romantic love. that the stuff of life.
Yes, it is.
Okay, we have talked for 40 min. I think that we had a good conversation
It was nice talking with you!
let me count we need 15 passes
i got 15.
Me too.
Do you think that we are good?
okie doke i enjoyed it too
clicking finish conversation now
Okay, I do that
Have a good night!
you too :)
